settings.text:
Want to return or exchange your order?

Get started here â¬‡ï¸

Not quite the right fit? Donâ€™t worry about it!

You can send your new jeans back within 30 days after receipt.

It goes without saying that the jeans must be sent back in their original condition (just to clarify things for the cheeky ones â€“ this means unworn, unwashed and labels attached ;)).

Super important!
We can only process registered returns, so please make sure toÂ register your returnÂ before you do anything else! Whether you'd like a refund or an exchange, your request can be registered viaÂ the returns portal.

Please note that the return costs may vary as per your location. Check our general return info section at end of this page for more info.

settings.title: 1. Register
settings.text: We accept returns within 30 days.Items have to be in original condition: unworn, unwashed and labels included.

settings.title: 2. Pack
settings.text: Pack the products you want to return and stick the return label which you can download upon registering your return.

settings.title: 3. Send
settings.text: Bring your parcel to a dropoff point of the carrier mentioned on the return label.

settings.title: 4. Refund/Exchange
settings.text: Processing your return or exchange can take up to 15 working days after the return has arrived at our warehouse.

settings.title: Sending your oldÂ MUD JeansÂ for recycling?Â
settings.text:
Thatâ€™s awesome! Thank you for contributing to our circular economyÂ ğŸ’š

1. Wait for your new MUD Jeans to arrive.

2. Register your returnÂ here :

  • Choose â€œReturn Old Jeans."
  • Choose Refund & Return
  • Is your MUD Jeans worn out?Â ChooseÂ â€œProduct is damagedâ€
  • Is your MUD Jeans still in a good condition and vintage worthy?Â ChooseÂ â€œDifferent than expected'â€

3. You're almost done! Now use the return label provided with your new jeans and its packaging to send your old jeans back.

settings.title: Sending old jeans fromÂ another brandÂ for recycling?
settings.text:
Remember, these jeans must be at least 96% cotton!

1.Â Wait until your new MUD Jeans have arrived.

2. Register your returnÂ here :

  • Choose "Return Old Jeans."
  • Choose "Refund & Return."
  • Choose "Product is damaged."

3.Â Use theâ€¯ free return label and package in which your new purchase arrived to send your old jeans to us. Easy, right?

settings.title: Check out theÂ general return info section for more details and get started with your returns.

settings.text:
Lucky you! We offer free repair service for leasers in Europe, within the lease term of one year.Â 

  • Sending the jeans to us is on your account. However, we will take care of the repair, as well as sending your new-looking jeans back to you!
  • Send an email toâ€¯info@mudjeans.euâ€¯to receive our current address for repairs and attach a photo of what you need repaired to the email.
  • Add a note to your parcel with the word â€œrepairâ€ + your name and address + what your need repaired.
  • Repairs can take up to 30 days and you will be informed once the jeans are ready and sent back to you.

PS: We only repairÂ freshly washedÂ jeans! Thanks for your understanding :)

The return process can be started byÂ registering your return.Â Please note that we won't be able to pay for or track your package.Â So, please make sure to keep your tracking number until your return has been processed.

Returns: We attach great importance to sustainability and want to limit returns as much as possible. Therefore we do not offer free returns. However, if you request an exchange, return costs are free and we will take care of the new shipping for you.

We will charge a return cost contribution. The fee is â‚¬4.95 for returns from the Netherlands, â‚¬5.95 from BE, DE, FR, LUX, and AT, and â‚¬9.95 from other countries. For United Kingdom, the returns fee is Â£9.95.

Depending on your location, additional costs / customs fees may apply, the amount of which we cannot determine and which we cannot influence directly.Â AnyÂ customs fees, taxes, duties and any other feesÂ for the return packageÂ are the responsibility of the customer. If the customs fees aren't paid in advance, we cannot receive your package, so please take care of this in advance. Check with your shipping provider if a commercial invoice is needed, and if yes, attach it to the package. We recommend UPS for non-EU returns.

If you request an exchange, we will pay for the new shipment to you - itâ€™s the least we can do.

Please note that processing your return can take up to 15 working days after the return has arrived at our warehouse.

The most sustainable option is to get your jeans repaired locally and avoidingâ€¯shipping your jeansâ€¯back and forth. If you are a leaser within your lease term of one year, we will pay you back up to â‚¬10 for it. In order to do so, send an email toÂ info@mudjeans.euÂ with a picture of your repaired MUD Jeans as well as the receipt of the tailor.Â
